info.title: Azure SQL Server API spec
info.description: The Azure SQL Server management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure SQL Server services to manage your databases. The API enables users update server connection policy.

get.description: Gets the server's secure connection policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.name: connectionPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the connection policy.
